original: @#/_/ku la lo ka bya tha'i rlabs dang rjes
analyzed: @#/_/ku la lo ka bya tha'i rlabs dang rjes
translated: The Waves and Aftermath of the Kuloka Rebellion

original: gnang bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs/
analyzed: gnang bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs/
translated: The Stages of the Wave and Subsequent Authorization of Lokakula

original: @#/_/'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rigs kyi 'jig
analyzed: @#/_/'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rigs kyi 'jig
translated: Homage to Lokeśvara!🔽The stages of meditation on the family of Lokeśvara:

original: rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa ni/_gnas dben par stan bde ba la
analyzed: rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa ni/_gnas dben par stan bde ba la
translated: In an isolated place, on a comfortable seat,

original: sems dpa'i skyil krung ngam ji ltar bde bas _'dug la/_skyabs su 'gro ba🔽dang /_sdug bsngal ba du mas gdungs pa'i sems can 'di rnams kyi don du/
analyzed: sems dpa'i skyil krung ngam ji ltar bde bas _'dug la/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba du mas gdungs pa'i sems can 'di rnams kyi don du/
translated: sit in the bodhisattva posture or however you like and go for refuge🔽and arouse the mind of awakening, thinking, “For the sake of these sentient beings who are tormented by many sufferings,

original: bdag gis rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub snyam du byang chub kyi sems
analyzed: bdag gis rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub snyam du byang chub kyi sems
translated: I will accomplish the family of Lokeśvara.”

original: bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas/_rang gi snying gar pam las pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar
analyzed: bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas/_rang gi snying gar pam las pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar
translated: With that as the preliminary, in your heart, from paṃ, is a red lotus.🔽In its center, from āḥ, is an moon maṇḍala,

original: a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_yi ge hrih_'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas
analyzed: a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_yi ge hrih_'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas
translated: upon which is the syllable hrih, radiating light rays.

original: pa bsam/_de las 'od zer lus kyi nang kun du 'phros pas/_lus mi gtshang
analyzed: pa bsam/_de las 'od zer lus kyi nang kun du 'phros pas/_lus mi gtshang
translated: Imagine that light rays shine from that, filling the whole inside of your body, and your body becomes clear as a crystal ball.

original: ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsha gnyis kyis gang ba snying po med par bsam pa lus rjes su🔽dran pa dang /_de la brten pa'i sems gzung 'dzin sna tshhogs su snang ba ngo bos
analyzed: ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsha gnyis kyis gang ba snying po med par bsam pa lus rjes su dran pa dang /_de la brten pa'i sems gzung 'dzin sna tshhogs su snang ba ngo bos
translated: The mindfulness of body is to contemplate that the body, which is filled with thirty-two substances, is devoid of any essence.

original: ma grub par bsams pa sems rjes su dran pa dang /_de dag las byung ba'i tshhor🔽ba bde sdug btang  snyoms kyis bsdus pa rnams rang bzhin gyis ma grub par
analyzed: ma grub par bsams pa sems rjes su dran pa dang /_de dag las byung ba'i tshhor ba bde sdug btang  snyoms kyis bsdus pa rnams rang bzhin gyis ma grub par
translated: The mindfulness of mind is to contemplate that the mind, which is based on the body and appears as the various dualistic perceptions of subject and object, is devoid of any essence.

original: bsam pa tshhor ba rjes su dran pa dang /_de rnams kyis chos rang bzhin gyis spros
analyzed: bsam pa tshhor ba rjes su dran pa dang /_de rnams kyis chos rang bzhin gyis spros
translated: The mindfulness of warmth is to contemplate that the feelings, which are included in the categories of pleasure, pain, and neutrality, and which arise from the body and mind, are devoid of any intrinsic existence.

original: pa'i mtha' dang bral bar bsam pa chos rjes su dran pa rnams bsgom/_de'i🔽rjes su 'od zer rnams ba spu'i bu ga nas phyogs kun du 'phros pas/_mdun
analyzed: pa'i mtha' dang bral bar bsam pa chos rjes su dran pa rnams bsgom/_de'i rjes su 'od zer rnams ba spu'i bu ga nas phyogs kun du 'phros pas/_mdun
translated: The mindfulness of phenomena is to contemplate that phenomena are free from the extremes of conceptual elaborations.

original: gyi nam mkhar rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
analyzed: gyi nam mkhar rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
translated: After that, light rays radiate from the pores of your body in all directions, inviting the lords of the lineage, the lords of the world, in the space in front of you, together with the hosts of buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: dpa'i tshhogs dang bcas pa spyan drangs/_de la yid kyis phyag bya/_rang gi
analyzed: dpa'i tshhogs dang bcas pa spyan drangs/_de la yid kyis phyag bya/_rang gi
translated: Mentally prostrate to them.

original: snying ga'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod/_de nas/
analyzed: snying ga'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod/_de nas/
translated: Offering goddesses emanate from the seed syllable at the heart and present offerings.

original: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/_/sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags//
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/_/sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags//
translated: Then recite: I go for refuge to the Three Jewels. I confess each and every misdeed.

original: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung /_/🔽zhes don dran bzhin pas brjod/_de nas sems can thams cad la byams pa
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung /_/ zhes don dran bzhin pas brjod/_de nas sems can thams cad la byams pa
translated: I rejoice in the virtue of beings. I hold the enlightened mind in my heart.🔽Recite this while remembering its meaning. Then meditate on love🔽for all sentient beings, compassion, joy, and impartiality, the four

original: dang /_snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te/_tshhangs pa'i gnas bzhi
analyzed: dang /_snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te/_tshhangs pa'i gnas bzhi
translated: immeasurables.

original: bsgom/_de'i rjes su thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas mchod bya'i
analyzed: bsgom/_de'i rjes su thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas mchod bya'i
translated: After that, light radiates from the seed syllable at the heart, and the

original: yul rnams dang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa rnams dang /_rang gi lus kyang sa
analyzed: yul rnams dang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa rnams dang /_rang gi lus kyang sa
translated: objects of offering, the environment and its inhabitants, and your own🔽body dissolve into the seed syllable.

original: bon la thim par bsam/_de nas sa bon yang nam mkha' la 'ja' yal ba
analyzed: bon la thim par bsam/_de nas sa bon yang nam mkha' la 'ja' yal ba
translated: Then imagine that the seed syllable dissolves into space like a

original: bzhin du bsams la/_obyu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha wa a ham/_zhes rigs
analyzed: bzhin du bsams la/_obyu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha wa a ham/_zhes rigs
translated: rainbow and recite: oṃ yoga jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ

original: drug gi nga rgyal bya/_de nas nasapam las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hum las khro
analyzed: drug gi nga rgyal bya/_de nas nasapam las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hum las khro
translated: Then, from naṃ and pāṃ, on a lotus and sun disk seat, hūṃ becomes a wrathful blue Cakrasaṃvara……vajra samaya jaḥ.🔽

original: bo'i rdo rje gdengs pa kha dog nag po lte ba la hum gis mtshhan par bsam/
analyzed: bo'i rdo rje gdengs pa kha dog nag po lte ba la hum gis mtshhan par bsam/
translated: Then, from pam, on a lotus mandala, imagine a black wrathful vajra with a goad, marked with hum at the hub.

original: las 'od zer dbang po dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i phyogs su kun du 'phros
analyzed: las 'od zer dbang po dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i phyogs su kun du 'phros
translated: From that, light rays radiate in all directions to Indra, Yama, and so forth,

original: pas bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa tshhar bcad nas/_slar 'dus rdo rje'i sa
analyzed: pas bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa tshhar bcad nas/_slar 'dus rdo rje'i sa
translated: cutting through the maras, obstructors, and so forth, and then reabsorbing.

original: gzhi ra ba dra ba gur bla re ye shes kyi me 'bar ba dang bcas par gyur par bsam/
analyzed: gzhi ra ba dra ba gur bla re ye shes kyi me 'bar ba dang bcas par gyur par bsam/
translated: Imagine that the vajra ground, enclosure, lattice, canopy, and blazing fire of timeless awareness appear.🔽Inside of that, imagine a white source of phenomena with an

original: de'i nang du hum yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i chos kyi 'byung gnas phyi dkar la🔽ku la lo ka byin tha'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs🔽nang dmar ba gdengs ka gyen du phyogs pa bsgom/_de'i nang du pam las pad+ma
analyzed: de'i nang du hum yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i chos kyi 'byung gnas phyi dkar la ku la lo ka byin tha'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs nang dmar ba gdengs ka gyen du phyogs pa bsgom/_de'i nang du pam las pad+ma
translated: open apex facing upward,🔽the outside white and the inside red.🔽In its center, from pam, is a red lotus,

original: dmar po'i lte bar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po'i steng du hrih_las byung
analyzed: dmar po'i lte bar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po'i steng du hrih_las byung
translated: in its center, from ah, is a white moon mandala,🔽upon which is hrih, from which arises a white, four-faced, four-armed Avalokiteshvara.

original: ba lcags kyu dmar po'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa'i pa'i gis mtshhan pa
analyzed: ba lcags kyu dmar po'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa'i pa'i gis mtshhan pa
translated: It is marked with a red iron hook radiating light rays.

original: bsam/_de yongs su gyur pa las rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug yum dang bcas pa gnyis ka'ang sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/🔽phyag g.yas kyi dang po lcags kyu/_gnyis pa rin po che dang mchog sbyin/_g.yon gyi
analyzed: bsam/_de yongs su gyur pa las rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug yum dang bcas pa gnyis ka'ang sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po lcags kyu/_gnyis pa rin po che dang mchog sbyin/_g.yon gyi
translated: That completely transforms into the two of the family, Lokeshvara with his consort, both red, with one face, four arms, and three eyes.

original: dang po na zhags pa dang bcas pas 'khyud pa/_gnyis pa na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin🔽pa/_mu tig dang nor bu'i tshhogs kyis brgyan pa/_'od dpag tu med pa'i
analyzed: dang po na zhags pa dang bcas pas 'khyud pa/_gnyis pa na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa/_mu tig dang nor bu'i tshhogs kyis brgyan pa/_'od dpag tu med pa'i
translated: The first right hand holds an iron hook, the second a jewel and a boon-granting gesture; the first left holds a lasso and embraces, the second a red lotus.🔽They are adorned with pearls and jewels, have crowns of Amitabha, and sit in sattva posture.

original: cod pan can sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/_shin tu dgyes pa'i
analyzed: cod pan can sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/_shin tu dgyes pa'i
translated: Meditate on them with the expression of great bliss.

original: nyams dang ldan pa bsgom/_de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas/
analyzed: nyams dang ldan pa bsgom/_de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas/
translated: Then light radiates from the seed syllable at the heart,🔽inviting the family Lokeshvara from Akanishtha.

original: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drang /_mchod pa
analyzed: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drang /_mchod pa
translated: Make offerings and praise.

original: rnams kyis mchod/_dzahhu~m bam hohzhes pas rang gi lus dang gnyis su med par
analyzed: rnams kyis mchod/_dzahhu~m bam hohzhes pas rang gi lus dang gnyis su med par
translated: Then, with “jah hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ,” they dissolve inseparably into your body.🔽Again, visualize the three seed syllables in the heart.

original: bstim slar yang thugs kar yi ge gsum gyi sngags bsam/_de dag las 'od🔽zer 'phros pas/_dbang gi lha spyan drangs mchod pas mchod/_om sarba ta tha
analyzed: bstim slar yang thugs kar yi ge gsum gyi sngags bsam/_de dag las 'od zer 'phros pas/_dbang gi lha spyan drangs mchod pas mchod/_om sarba ta tha
translated: Light rays radiate from them🔽and invoke the empowerment deities.🔽Offer them with “oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣiñca tu.”

original: ga ta a b+hi shiny+tsha tu tu zhes dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab/_de bzhin
analyzed: ga ta a b+hi shiny+tsha tu tu zhes dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab/_de bzhin
translated: Make the supplication to confer the empowerment with “oṃ all tathāgatas🔽please confer the actual empowerment upon me.”

original: gshegs pa de rnams kyis ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar
analyzed: gshegs pa de rnams kyis ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar
translated: Imagine that the tathāgatas confer the empowerment with vases filled with the water of awareness.

original: bsams la/_lha'i sku la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan bya/_de las skyo na sngags
analyzed: bsams la/_lha'i sku la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan bya/_de las skyo na sngags
translated: Then do the meditative concentration that focuses on the deity’s form.

original: kyi bzlas pa ni thugs ka nas/_hrihhum dzahzhes pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba zhal nas
analyzed: kyi bzlas pa ni thugs ka nas/_hrihhum dzahzhes pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba zhal nas
translated: When you feel weary of that, for the mantra recitation, a mantra string of hriḥ hūṃ jaḥ emerges from the heart🔽and exits from the mouth.

original: 'thon/_yum gyi zhal du zhugs mkha' dang gsang ba'i rim pa bzhin brgyud
analyzed: 'thon/_yum gyi zhal du zhugs mkha' dang gsang ba'i rim pa bzhin brgyud
translated: It enters the mother’s mouth, passes through her space and secret place,🔽and dissolves into the heart.

original: nas thugs kar thim zhing 'khor ba la dmigs nas sems gzhan du ma 'phro bar
analyzed: nas thugs kar thim zhing 'khor ba la dmigs nas sems gzhan du ma 'phro bar
translated: Focusing on that, do not let your attention stray elsewhere.

original: bzlas par bya/_thun mtshhams su mchod pa dang gtor ma btang zhing /_gnas
analyzed: bzlas par bya/_thun mtshhams su mchod pa dang gtor ma btang zhing /_gnas
translated: One should recite [the mantra].

original: skabs thams cad du lha'i nga rgyal dang mi 'bral bar bya/_rdzogs pa'i rim pa🔽bsgom pa ni/_lnga bcu pa dang /_de nyid kyi don grub ma hi mas blangs pa'i sgrub
analyzed: skabs thams cad du lha'i nga rgyal dang mi 'bral bar bya/_rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni/_lnga bcu pa dang /_de nyid kyi don grub ma hi mas blangs pa'i sgrub
translated: In between sessions, one should make offerings and give torma, and in all situations, one should not be separate from the pride of the deity.🔽The meditation of the completion stage

original: thabs las 'byung ba bzhin nyams su blang bar bya'o//_//
analyzed: thabs las 'byung ba bzhin nyams su blang bar bya'o//_//
translated: should be practiced according to what appears in the Fifty Verses and the Sādhana of the Meaning of That composed by Aśvaghoṣa.

original: de ltar na ring por mi thogs par 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur 'gyur ro//🔽rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa pan+di ta chen po bi ma la shri'i
analyzed: de ltar na ring por mi thogs par 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa pan+di ta chen po bi ma la shri'i
translated: Thus, one will not be delayed in becoming the body of Lokeśvara.🔽This is the end of the Stages of Meditation on the Family of Lokeśvara,

original: zhal snga nas 'byung ba bzhin bris pa 'di rdzogs so//
analyzed: zhal snga nas 'byung ba bzhin bris pa 'di rdzogs so//
translated: written according to the teachings of the great paṇḍita Vimalamitra.🔽kulo lokanātha

original: ku la lo ka na tha ya/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rigs kyi 'jig rten
analyzed: ku la lo ka na tha ya/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rigs kyi 'jig rten
translated: The ritual permission of Ārya Avalokiteśvara, the Lord of the Family of Lokeśvara,

original: mgon po'i rjes gnang gi cho ga ni/_gnas dben par man+dal 'dab ma brgyad
analyzed: mgon po'i rjes gnang gi cho ga ni/_gnas dben par man+dal 'dab ma brgyad
translated: is as follows: In an isolated place, one should draw an eight-petaled maṇḍala

original: byas la/_de'i dbus su mtshhan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa bshams la gzhan🔽yang ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad sta gon byas nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rnal
analyzed: byas la/_de'i dbus su mtshhan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa bshams la gzhan yang ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad sta gon byas nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rnal
translated: In the center of that, set up a vase that has all the characteristics.🔽Also, set up whatever articles you have for the setup.🔽The master himself should meditate on the complete yoga,

original: 'byor rnams rdzogs par bsgom ste/_sngags ci rigs par bzlas la/_de'i rjes
analyzed: 'byor rnams rdzogs par bsgom ste/_sngags ci rigs par bzlas la/_de'i rjes
translated: recite the mantras as appropriate, and then

original: la bum pa cho ga bzhin du lhar bskyed la/_mchod bstod bzlas pa rnams
analyzed: la bum pa cho ga bzhin du lhar bskyed la/_mchod bstod bzlas pa rnams
translated: generate the vase as the deity according to the rite,🔽complete the offerings, praises, and recitations,

original: rdzogs par bya'o/_/de nas slob ma khrus byas nas/_phyag dang man+dal phul nas/
analyzed: rdzogs par bya'o/_/de nas slob ma khrus byas nas/_phyag dang man+dal phul nas/
translated: and then the disciples should wash, make prostrations, and offer a mandala.

original: de nas dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste/_/zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba
analyzed: de nas dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste/_/zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba
translated: Then, after supplicating with “Great joy, you are my teacher,”🔽and so on,

original: btab nas/_bu tshhur theg pa chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis theg pa la🔽spro ba bskyed nas/_dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/_/zhes pa la
analyzed: btab nas/_bu tshhur theg pa chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis theg pa la spro ba bskyed nas/_dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/_/zhes pa la
translated: encourage them with the mantra “Child, enter the Mahayana” and so on.🔽Then, after confessing misdeeds with “I go for refuge to the Three Jewels” and so on,

original: sogs pa sdig pa bshags pa dang /_ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/_/
analyzed: sogs pa sdig pa bshags pa dang /_ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/_/
translated: and “Just as the lords of the three times” and so on,

original: zhes pa la sogs pas rigs lnga'i khyad par gyi sdom pa sbyin pa dang /_de rnams
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas rigs lnga'i khyad par gyi sdom pa sbyin pa dang /_de rnams
translated: With those and so forth, the special vows of the five families are given.

original: mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir/_phan yon dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_mna'i chu
analyzed: mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir/_phan yon dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_mna'i chu
translated: In order to not degenerate those, the benefits, the faults, the water of the vow,

original: dang /_rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' mnyan pa'i sgo nas dam la gzhag_/sgrub
analyzed: dang /_rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' mnyan pa'i sgo nas dam la gzhag_/sgrub
translated: and the vajra master’s command are used to establish the vow.🔽The stages of the blessing and permission for the practice

original: ku la lo ka byin tha'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs
analyzed: ku la lo ka byin tha'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs
translated: of the three vajras are as follows:🔽The disciple is generated as the deity.

original: pa'i thabs ltar slob ma lhar bskyed la/_om ah_gis gis sku gsung thugs byin
analyzed: pa'i thabs ltar slob ma lhar bskyed la/_om ah_gis gis sku gsung thugs byin
translated: Bless the body, speech, and mind with oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: gyis brlabs ye shes pa gzhug pa dang /_bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ba
analyzed: gyis brlabs ye shes pa gzhug pa dang /_bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ba
translated: The awareness beings enter, and the empowerment is conferred with the vase water.

original: rnams byas nas/_/gsang sngags 'bru gsum snyan nas brgyud/_/bka' drin🔽gyi lan mchod pa dang /_/bsnyen bkur tshhul bzhin du byed du gzhug_/dge
analyzed: rnams byas nas/_/gsang sngags 'bru gsum snyan nas brgyud/_/bka' drin gyi lan mchod pa dang /_/bsnyen bkur tshhul bzhin du byed du gzhug_/dge
translated: After that, the three seed syllables of secret mantra are whispered in the ear.🔽The disciple is made to offer a gift of gratitude and service.🔽The virtue is dedicated to perfect awakening.

original: ba'i rtsha ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o/_/slob mas bla ma la yon phul te/
analyzed: ba'i rtsha ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o/_/slob mas bla ma la yon phul te/
translated: The disciple offers a gift to the guru.

original: tsha  ru'i bza' ba la longs spyad/_lhag ma'i bar rdzogs pa dang /_bsngo ba
analyzed: tsha  ru'i bza' ba la longs spyad/_lhag ma'i bar rdzogs pa dang /_bsngo ba
translated: Enjoy the food of the elder brother, and when the remainder is finished, do the dedication,

original: dang /_bzod gsol dang /_gshegs su gsol ba rnams cho ga bzhin bya'o/_/🔽de nas las kyi rjes mi _mngon par bsdus te/_bdag nyid spyod lam gyi rnal
analyzed: dang /_bzod gsol dang /_gshegs su gsol ba rnams cho ga bzhin bya'o/_/ de nas las kyi rjes mi _mngon par bsdus te/_bdag nyid spyod lam gyi rnal
translated: the request for forbearance, and the request for departure, all according to the rite.🔽Then, without making the subsequent action of the rite visible, one should remain in the yoga of conduct.

original: 'byor gyis gnas par bya'o/_/ku la lo ka na tha'i byin rlabs  dang rjes gnang bya
analyzed: 'byor gyis gnas par bya'o/_/ku la lo ka na tha'i byin rlabs  dang rjes gnang bya
translated: The stages of the blessing and permission of the Kula Lokanatha are

original: ba'i rim pa kha che'i pan+di ta bi ma la shri'i zhal snga nas bris pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: ba'i rim pa kha che'i pan+di ta bi ma la shri'i zhal snga nas bris pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: complete.

original: sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag pa'i/_/ma rig gsal ba'i rim pa las
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag pa'i/_/ma rig gsal ba'i rim pa las
translated: From the stages of the illumination of ignorance, which is the complete purity of the five buddhas,

original: /_/ dbang bskur byed pa'i rim pa yis/_/ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes
analyzed: /_/ dbang bskur byed pa'i rim pa yis/_/ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes
translated: through the stages of bestowing empowerment, the five pristine consciousnesses are attained.

original: rdo rje phreng ba las gsungs pas/_ma rig pa lnga bsal nas rig pa ye shes lnga
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba las gsungs pas/_ma rig pa lnga bsal nas rig pa ye shes lnga
translated: Since it is said in the Vajra Garland that the five ignorances are removed and the five pristine consciousnesses

original: rtogs par byed pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo /_/lo tsha ba blo brtan gyis bsgyur
analyzed: rtogs par byed pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo /_/lo tsha ba blo brtan gyis bsgyur
translated: are realized, it is the empowerment of pristine consciousness.🔽Translated by the Kashmiri Pandit Vimalashiri.

original: ba'o//_//   kyi la_/da ba la ba
analyzed: ba'o//_//   kyi la_/da ba la ba
translated: The and indicates that it is also the basis of the afflicted view of the self.
